contest-event.event-date:
April 7, 2018 D North American Championships (First Section)
North American Championships (First Section) 10 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-championships-1st-section
United States of America
First
Diversions on a Bass Theme
Embassy Theatre, Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA 11 am - 3 pm, 3.30-7 pm
The overall score is weighted as 60% test piece, 40% remainder of program. First tiebreaker: The band with the highest test piece scores wins. Second tiebreaker: The band rated higher on the test piece by 2 of the 3 judges wins.
Feb. 17, 2018, 8:54 a.m. Oct. 4, 2019, 10:18 a.m.

2 Weston Silver Band Larry Shields Between the Two Rivers
